thread.title: BRIEF-Alnylam Receives Positive Opinion For Orphan Drug Designation In EU For ALN-TTRsc02, For Treatment Of Transthyretin-Mediated Amyloidosis

title: BRIEF-Alnylam Receives Positive Opinion For Orphan Drug Designation In EU For ALN-TTRsc02, For Treatment Of Transthyretin-Mediated Amyloidosis

organizations.name: treatment of transthyretin-mediated amyloidosis reuters staff

text:
25 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Alnylam Receives Positive Opinion For Orphan Drug Designation In EU For ALN-TTRsc02, For Treatment Of Transthyretin-Mediated Amyloidosis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Alnylam Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* ALNYLAM RECEIVES POSITIVE OPINION FOR ORPHAN DRUG DESIGNATION IN THE EUROPEAN UNION FOR ALN-TTRSC02, A SUBCUTANEOUSLY DELIVERED INVESTIGATIONAL RNAI THERAPEUTIC FOR THE TREATMENT OF TRANSTHYRETIN-MEDIATED AMYLOIDOSIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
